## Projection.projectBox() method

Projects bounds in geo coordinates to a bounding box in world coordinates.

Example:

```typescript
const bounds = projection.projectBox(geoBox);
console.log(bounds.min, bounds.max);

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract projectBox(geoBox: GeoBox): Box3Like;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  geoBox | [GeoBox](./harp-geoutils.geobox.md) | The bounding box in geo coordinates. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Box3Like](./harp-geoutils.box3like.md)
